ai_answer:
Top recommendation: Nice, France

Alternates (in order): Mallorca (Spain), Palermo (Italy)
ai_explanation:
Here are past user queries that received successful answers and were similar to yours:

  1. Case #1 (“Where can I go for a relaxing seaside break within 2–3 hours of travel from Berlin’s airport? I live in the Berlin area, close to Potsdam”):

    In that earlier interaction, the AI returned [Mallorca, Nice, Costa Brava].

  2. Case #2 (“I’m based in Berlin and want a laid-back beach vacation without a long flight. Any suggestions?”):

    Returned [Nice, Palermo, Mallorca].
